message: I propose a 90/10 split in my favor.  It's a fair start, considering I'm taking the risk of going first.
I propose a 55/45 split in my favor. This is a fairer split considering the risk of you rejecting my offer and having to wait another round for your turn.
I'm going to counter your offer with a 60/40 split in my favor. This is a fair compromise considering we both had to wait a round, and I'm still taking the risk of you rejecting my offer again.
